title: Aatrox is the new Yasuo
body:
Every noob picks him in every lane, then ints and wonders why we are losing the game.

SO many games lost because mid wants to aatrox and then we have no AP damage.

I'm starting to ban Aatrox because I don't want him on my team :\

replies.body: He's meta and now appeals to the mass audience... it's very unfortunate for players like me who liked Aatrox long before he was seen as being 'good' :( RIP OGTROX.
yeah except aatrox is actually busted unlike yas

> [{quoted}](name=Kelg,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=bTJHKFEh,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2019-01-12T18:33:52.331+0000)
>
> yeah except aatrox is actually busted unlike yas

^This

Every yas on my team = ints
Every yas on enemy team = 4 knock up whombo combo, tilts my team and wins
